channel.title: regression on Zijie Wang`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in regression on Zijie Wang`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 知识蒸馏] SimReg: Regression as a Simple Yet Effective Tool (BMVC 2021)
item.description: 2201.05131 SimReg: Regression as a Simple Yet Effective Tool for Self-supervised Knowledge Distillation (BMVC 2021) 开源代码传送门 概述 本文关注自监督模型的蒸馏，发现 backbone 输出的特征比预测头最后一层输出的特征能更好地与教师模型相匹配
